string.text: Select how you want your smithing stamina notifications to be shown:
Show smithing stamina notification in the log in the bottom-left corner of the screen.
Show smithing stamina notification in the top-middle part of the screen.
Show smithing stamina notification as a round pop up on the right side of the screen.
Stop waiting when stamina is full
Hero will stop waiting when main hero stamina reaches 100%.
All hero party members will regenerate smithing stamina while travelling. 3 days = 100% stamina.
Show smithing stamina recovery notifications while hero is travelling. [Regen stamina while travelling] option must be enabled for this to work.
Show current smithing stamina percent every hour while waiting in town.
Show current smithing stamina percent every hour while travelling in the world.
Regenerate smithing stamina based on hero's smithing skill.\nSimple formula: (Smithing skill / 20) = Regeneration amount per hour.
In how many hours any hero in party will replenish stamina from 0% to 100%. [Default: 72 hours]
A helper number to calculate how much stamina will be replenished every hour if immersive mode is selected. Higher number = longer replenishment. [Default: 20]
